title: Watch Face - NEXO
summary: Beautiful, high quality, unique Watch Face.You can choose your favorite color.
description: NEXO Watch Face modern, clean design.The perfect combination of classic and modern style.This Watch Face works on watches with round and square display – for Android Wear OS. Features of NEXO Watch Face : ★ Very readable design.★ Digital Clock (minutes)★ Day of week★ Month and day of month★ Seconds★ Battery Level★ Ambient Mode (Always On)★ Customizable colors - choose color and saturation by the slider★ 4 (green, red, yellow, blue) color presets Compatibile with:- Motorola 360 - Moto 360 2015 - Moto 360 Sports- Huawei Watch- Casio WSD-F10- LG G Watch R- LG G Watch- TAG Heuer- Fossil Q- LG Watch Urbane- Samsung Gear Live- Asus ZenWatch (1 & 2)- Sony Smartwatch 3  (NOT for Samsung Gear S2  - Tizen OS) How to Use Watch Face:Install the application on your smartphone (paired). Nexo Watch Face will be automatically installed on your watch (this may take a few minutes).Please feel free to contact me if you have any issues or questions (e-mail). Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
NEXO Watch Face modern, clean design.

The perfect combination of classic and modern style.

This Watch Face works on watches with round and square display – for Android Wear OS.


Features of NEXO Watch Face :

★ Very readable design.
★ Digital Clock (minutes)
★ Day of week
★ Month and day of month
★ Seconds
★ Battery Level
★ Ambient Mode (Always On)
★ Customizable colors - choose color and saturation by the slider
★ 4 (green, red, yellow, blue) color presets


Compatibile with:

- Motorola 360
- Moto 360 2015
- Moto 360 Sports
- Huawei Watch
- Casio WSD-F10
- LG G Watch R
- LG G Watch
- TAG Heuer
- Fossil Q
- LG Watch Urbane
- Samsung Gear Live
- Asus ZenWatch (1 & 2)
- Sony Smartwatch 3


(NOT for Samsung Gear S2 - Tizen OS)


How to Use Watch Face:

Install the application on your smartphone (paired). Nexo Watch Face will be automatically installed on your watch (this may take a few minutes).


Please feel free to contact me if you have any issues or questions (e-mail). Thanks!
comments: One of the creative and we'll executed watch faces. To the point in terms of information and not trying to do too much. The design itself is sharp and of high quality. Can't recommend enough! Well done.
fake app. does not show up on the watch. malware inside
The reinstall worked for those of you who have the same issue of it not showing up. Love the design!
Installed app on phone but it's not showing up on Android Wear or the watch? LG urbane
Never showed up in Android wear.
My week start from Sunday.. Can I change it to show first?
